column2:
The most current version of the stock operating system image is available. When a new version of an operating system is made available, the older version image of that guest operating system changes to deprecated.
                No stock operating system that reaches EOS has an available image.

Older versions of stock operating systems are deprecated. Also, any stock operating system that reached EOS is also deprecated. The UI doesn't display any deprecated images when creating an instance.
                These images are still visible in the CLI and API.
